bilingual.source: There is a possibility of rain tomorrow.
The possibility of finding a solution is high.
bilingual.target: 找到解决方案的可能性很高。

bilingual.source: A modal verb can be used to express possibility.
bilingual.target: 情态动词可以用来表达可能性。

bilingual.source: The doctor warned him about the possibility of a relapse.
bilingual.target: 医生警告他有可能会复发。

bilingual.source: They discussed the possibility of joining the federation.
bilingual.target: 他们讨论了加入联邦的可能性。

bilingual.source: She mentioned the possibility of moving to another city.
bilingual.target: 她提到了搬到另一个城市的可能性。

bilingual.source: The possibility of meeting the author excites the readers.
bilingual.target: 见到作者的可能性使读者们兴奋。

bilingual.source: The doctor eliminated the possibility of a serious illness.
bilingual.target: 医生消除了患严重疾病的可能性。

bilingual.source: Scientists are exploring the possibility of human cloning.
bilingual.target: 科学家们正在研究克隆人的可能性。

bilingual.source: This book explores the possibility of preexistence memories.
bilingual.target: 这本书探讨了前世记忆的可能性。

list.abstract: Possibility为LykkeLi演唱。她是瑞典新晋独立流行女歌手，本名LiLykkeTimotejZachrisson。21岁时返回瑞典录制首张唱片，发行后得到诸多乐评媒体称赞，在独立音乐爱好者中人气渐长。后为大热电影原声带提供歌曲possibility。这首歌是在电影中，女主角Bella和男主角Edward分开后，Bella忧居在家，面对窗外的四季变换时的插曲，及其符合当时Bella的心境和忧伤的气氛。
possibility为美国歌手Tiffany Alvord2011年演唱，出自专辑《My Dream》。

yingyinNormal.en: Have we talked about the possibility of multiple births?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们谈过多胞胎的可能吗？

yingyinNormal.en: With? The possibility that Peter is the father.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用什么伤害她？彼得是孩子的父亲这种可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a slim possibility, but even the question can cause problems.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这可能性很小，但仅仅是质疑就能造成麻烦。

yingyinNormal.en: That it's time to start considering the possibility that Margot ran away.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这意味着有很大可能玛戈是离家出走。

yingyinNormal.en: I suggest you open your eyes to the possibility as your father would.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我建议你睁大眼睛看清一切，可能正如你父亲所做。

yingyinNormal.en: So we will see you in detention as well. That's not a possibility, Miss Darbus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以你也要留校，不可能，达布丝小姐。

yingyinNormal.en: Think we need to start entertaining the possibility that the Shamy could go on for years.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们得考虑谢米恋发展数年的可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: Every time your team rolls out an update, there's a possibility of a critical failure.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每次你的团队运行一次更新，都有出现重大故障的可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: What? While unlikely, it's still a statistical possibility. She might be performing sexual acts with him and not even know it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？虽然很难碰上，但也不是不可能啊，她现在可能正无意识的与他发生性行为呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, every country that contributed troops knew that something like this was a possibility.
yingyinNormal.zh: 每个派出部队参加的国家都明白这样的事可能发生。

yingyinNormal.en: They would like us to consider the possibility, okay, of, meeting with some, potential CEOs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们希望我们能考虑，恩，见见潜在的首席执行官的可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: I said it was a possibility. And did you manipulate him into signing off on his will? Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我只是说这有一定可能性。那你操纵他并让他修改遗嘱了吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: So, do you have any other possibilities? Oh yeah, well there's the possibility that I won't make rent.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你还有其他的机会吗？有，我很可能会付不出房租来。

yingyinNormal.en: I work at Bloomingdale's and I might know of a job possibility if you are, if you are interested?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在布鲁明戴尔百货公司上班，如果你有兴趣，我有个可能的工作机会。

yingyinNormal.en: What about me? I'm sorry, Leonard. It's too early to discount the possibility of this being an inside job.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我呢？对不起，莱纳德，现在就排除内鬼作案的可能性还为时过早。

yingyinNormal.en: We do share DNA, so there is the possibility, however remote, that resting in her loins is the potential for another individual as remarkable as myself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们确实有相同的DNA，所以有这种可能，尽管可能性不大，她的天赋可以创造另一个像我这样不平凡的人。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, my work in physics, her work in neurobiology, and most recently, the possibility of our having a child together.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的物理工作和她的神经生物学工作，最新话题是论我们生个孩子的可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: Shouldn't we at least entertain the possibility? Yeah, but how can we determine it one way or the other? Definitively?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们至少应该考虑一下这种可能吧？是的，但我们怎么确定到底是怎么样的？如何肯定？

yingyinNormal.en: Using all fictitious names, the possibility of you surviving another sexual scandal if Alicia doesn't stand beside you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 全用了虚构的名字，调查了如果艾丽西娅不支持你的话你，能挺过又一场性丑闻的可能性。

yingyinNormal.en: In The Hidden Reality, I explore this possibility without presuming any knowledge of mathematics or physics on the part of the reader.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在《隐藏的真相》中，我在不涉及任何数学和物理知识的情况下向读者阐释了这一可能。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: adj. 办得到的；可能的；有能力的；可能发生的；潜在的；可能如此的；能够成为的

examination_example.sentence: "It's important for children to see other <highlight>possibilities</highlight> and other paths they can take."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “让孩子们看到其他可能性和他们可以选择的其他道路是很重要的。”

examination_example.sentence: These together opened up the <highlight>possibility</highlight> of prosperity for even its poorest residents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些因素共同开辟了繁荣的可能性，即使是对最贫穷的居民来说。

examination_example.sentence: The study did not examine the <highlight>possibility</highlight> of deep psychological significance to the mistake, says psychologist David Rubin, "but it does tell us who's in and who's out of the group."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 心理学家 David Rubin 说，该研究并没有考察这种错误是否具有深层次的心理学意义，“但它确实告诉我们，谁在这个群体中，谁在这个群体之外”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: "Let's look directly into the issue of collapse," they say, "and deal with the terrible <highlight>possibilities</highlight> of what we see there."
examination_example.sentence_trans: “让我们直接审视坍塌的问题，”他们说，“并处理我们在那里看到的可怕的可能性。“

examination_example.sentence: To test for that <highlight>possibility</highlight>, Dr. Berger looked at how people spread a particular set of news stories.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了测试这种可能性，伯杰博士研究了人们如何传播一组特定的新闻故事。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: But I hope you will at least consider the <highlight>possibility</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我希望你至少考虑一下这种可能性。

examination_example.sentence: As they thought about this <highlight>possibility</highlight>, they all began to treat each other with strong respect (尊重).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他们想到这种可能性时，他们都开始以强烈的敬意对待彼此。

examination_example.sentence: Do scientists agree that there's a <highlight>possibility</highlight> that humans in the future would live on Mars?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学家们是否同意未来人类有可能生活在火星上?
